attributes.action: push for reform in the EU with the aim of making it more democratic and less corrupt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU is one of the least democratic organisations in developed world, and one of the most corrupt. We petition the Prime Minister to himself petition our representatives in the EU to push for reforms that make it a more democratic Union that represents the peoples of Europe, rather than the politicians and the Commission's personal interests.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
